text:
“Dear Rodya,” the letter began. 

“Your sister has lived with me for six weeks. Thank God, her sufferings are over.”

He paused, heart racing.

“I couldn’t tell you everything before. You would have come rushing to her side.”

Dounia had taken the governess job for a hundred roubles. 

“She needed to send you sixty roubles. We deceived you then.”

He clenched the letter, feeling the weight of her sacrifice.

“Now, you must know how much she loves you.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia has been living with the narrator for six weeks, and her sufferings are over, revealing her deep love for Rodya.
